carskit.alg.cars.adaptation.dependent.dev

Class CSLIM_CI

  • java.lang.Object
    • carskit.generic.Recommender
      • carskit.generic.IterativeRecommender
        • carskit.generic.ContextRecommender
          • carskit.alg.cars.adaptation.dependent.CSLIM
            • carskit.alg.cars.adaptation.dependent.dev.CSLIM_CI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    @Configuration(value="binThold, knn, regLw2, regLw1, regLc2, regLc1, similarity, iters, rc")
public class CSLIM_CI
extends CSLIM
    CSLIM_CI: Zheng, Yong, Bamshad Mobasher, and Robin Burke. "CSLIM: Contextual slim recommendation algorithms." Proceedings of the 8th ACM Conference on Recommender Systems. ACM, 2014.

    Note: in this algorithm, there is a rating deviation for each pair of item and context condition; and it is built upon SLIM-I algorithm
